excerpt: The TMCM-1636 is a single axis servo drive for 3-phase BLDC motors and DC motors with up to ca. 1000W running at +24V or +48V. It offers a CAN & UART interface with either TMCL or CANopen protocol for communication. TMCM-1636 supports various positions feedback options: 2x incremental quadrature encoders, analog encoder, digital HALL sensor, absolute SPI- and SSI-based encoders. Customization of firmware and hardware is possible.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesFOCposition mode
